author: United Nations

resources.description: Zipped csv downloaded and cached on 2010-10-29 (see notes)

organization.description: This is a group to collect and curate high value and high quality datasets related to international development and aid.
organization.title: International Development Data
organization.name: international-development

name: millenium-development-goals-indicators
notes:
Millenium Development Goals Indicators Data.

'Bulk' download is now available via <http://mdgs.un.org/unsd/mdg/Handlers/ExportHandler.ashx?Type=Csv> though unfortunately this is not a dump but an action that returns the resulting dataset (after ~60s). The download dataset is therefore a cached version of this data.

A browseable web interface can be found at <http://openeconomics.net/mdg/> as well as on main UN site (see package url). There is also [python code for handling the raw csv data](http://knowledgeforge.net/econ/hg/file/tip/econdata/mdg). 

### Openness: Open

[Copyright page](http://data.un.org/Host.aspx?Content=UNdataUse) states:

> All data and metadata provided on UNdataâ€™s website are available free of charge and may be copied freely, duplicated and further distributed provided that UNdata is cited as the reference.
title: Millenium Development Goals Indicators
